languages.text: Когда пришло время принять бразды правления Адептус Арбитес, маршал Антар первым делом казнил каждого, кто мог не оказать ему беспрекословного подчинения. Следующим шагом стала публикация обновленного Лекс Коронус, написанного кровью преступников — священная книга была выставлена в переименованном Дворце Наказаний. Маршал Антар отправлял карательные отряды за любым, кто не соблюдал последнюю версию Лекс Коронус, и эти безжалостные походы стали символом гнетущего ужаса перед новым, чудовищным ликом закона в Просторе.

When his time came to take the reins of the Adeptus Arbites, Marshal Anthar began his watch by immediately executing any who would not obey him without question. His next step was to formulate a new Lex Koronus, written in the blood of criminals. The sacred tome was put on display at what was now called the Palace of Punishment. Marshal Anthar sent death squads after any who did not uphold the latest version of the Lex Koronus. These merciless raids came to epitomise the oppressive terror of the new and monstrous face of the law in the Expanse.
languages.original_text: Когда пришло время принять бразды правления Адептус Арбитес, маршал Антар первым делом казнил каждого, кто мог не оказать ему беспрекословного подчинения. Следующим шагом стала публикация обновленного Лекс Коронус, написанного кровью преступников — священная книга была выставлена в переименованном Дворце Наказаний. Маршал Антар отправлял карательные отряды за любым, кто не соблюдал последнюю версию Лекс Коронус, и эти безжалостные походы стали символом гнетущего ужаса перед новым, чудовищным ликом закона в Просторе.

traits.locale_text: When his time came to take the reins of the Adeptus Arbites, Marshal Anthar began by immediately executing any who would not obey him without question. His next step was to publish an updated Lex Koronus written in the blood of criminals. The sacred book was put on display at what was now called the Palace of Punishment. Marshal Anthar sent death squads after any who did not uphold the latest version of the Lex Koronus. Those merciless raids came to epitomise the oppressive terror of the new and monstrous face of the law in the Expanse.

His next step was to formulate a new Lex Koronus, written in the blood of criminals. The sacred tome was put on display at what was now called the Palace of Punishment. languages.text: Als seine Zeit gekommen war, die Adeptus Arbites anzuführen, richtete Marschall Anthar zunächst alle hin, die ihm nicht ohne Fragen gehorchen wollten. Sein nächster Schritt war ein neues Lex Koronus, geschrieben mit dem Blut von Verbrechern. Die heilige Schrift wurde an einem Ort ausgestellt, der heute als Palast der Bestrafung bekannt ist. Marschall Anthar entsandte Todesschwadronen zu allen, die sich nicht an die neueste Version des Lex Koronus hielten. Diese gnadenlosen Angriffe wurden zum Sinnbild für die Unterdrückung und den Terror durch das neue, monströse Gesicht des Gesetzes in der Ausdehnung.
languages.original_text: When his time came to take the reins of the Adeptus Arbites, Marshal Anthar began his watch by immediately executing any who would not obey him without question. His next step was to formulate a new Lex Koronus, written in the blood of criminals. The sacred tome was put on display at what was now called the Palace of Punishment. Marshal Anthar sent death squads after any who did not uphold the latest version of the Lex Koronus. These merciless raids came to epitomise the oppressive terror of the new and monstrous face of the law in the Expanse.

traits.locale_text: Als seine Zeit gekommen war, die Adeptus Arbites anzuführen, richtete Marschall Anthar zunächst alle hin, die ihm nicht ohne Fragen gehorchen wollten. Sein nächster Schritt war ein neues Lex Koronus, geschrieben mit dem Blut von Verbrechern. Die heilige Schrift wurde an einem Ort ausgestellt, der heute als Palast der Bestrafung bekannt ist. Marschall Anthar entsandte Todesschwadronen zu allen, die sich nicht an die neueste Version des Lex Koronus hielten. Diese gnadenlosen Angriffe wurden zum Sinnbild für die Unterdrückung und den Terror durch das neue, monströse Gesicht des Gesetzes in der Ausdehnung.

languages.text: Lorsqu'il prit les rênes de l'Adeptus Arbites, le maréchal Anthar ordonna immédiatement l'exécution de tous ceux qui n'étaient pas prêts à lui obéir sans poser de question. Il rédigea ensuite une nouvelle Lex Koronus avec le sang des criminels, tome sacré exposé dans ce qui devint par la suite le Palais du Châtiment. Le maréchal Anthar envoya des escadrons de la mort à la poursuite de quiconque ne respectait pas cette nouvelle version de la Lex Koronus. Ces raids impitoyables devinrent le symbole de la terreur oppressante qu'inspirait le nouveau et monstrueux visage de la loi dans les Étendues.
languages.original_text: When his time came to take the reins of the Adeptus Arbites, Marshal Anthar began his watch by immediately executing any who would not obey him without question. His next step was to formulate a new Lex Koronus, written in the blood of criminals. The sacred tome was put on display at what was now called the Palace of Punishment. Marshal Anthar sent death squads after any who did not uphold the latest version of the Lex Koronus. These merciless raids came to epitomise the oppressive terror of the new and monstrous face of the law in the Expanse.

traits.locale_text: Lorsqu'il prit les rênes de l'Adeptus Arbites, le maréchal Anthar ordonna immédiatement l'exécution de tous ceux qui n'étaient pas prêts à lui obéir sans poser de question. Il rédigea ensuite une nouvelle Lex Koronus avec le sang des criminels, tome sacré exposé dans ce qui devint par la suite le Palais du Châtiment. languages.text: 安萨元帅执掌帝国法务部之后，立刻处决了所有不肯坚决服从命令的人。在这之后，他编纂了全新的科罗努斯扩区法典，法典条文由罪犯的鲜血写就。如今，这本圣典摆在被称为“惩罚大厅”的殿堂里。对于那些不肯遵守全新科罗努斯扩区法典的人，安萨元帅会派遣死士小队，将那些罪人就地格杀。这些毫不留情的突袭，让所有人都感觉到难以喘息的恐怖，代表着科罗努斯扩区残忍、无情的全新律法。
languages.original_text: When his time came to take the reins of the Adeptus Arbites, Marshal Anthar began his watch by immediately executing any who would not obey him without question. His next step was to formulate a new Lex Koronus, written in the blood of criminals. The sacred tome was put on display at what was now called the Palace of Punishment. Marshal Anthar sent death squads after any who did not uphold the latest version of the Lex Koronus. These merciless raids came to epitomise the oppressive terror of the new and monstrous face of the law in the Expanse.

安萨元帅执掌帝国法务部之后，立刻处决了所有不肯坚决服从命令的人。在这之后，他制定了全新的科罗努斯扩区法典，法典条文由罪犯的鲜血写就。如今，这本圣典摆在被称为“惩罚大厅”的殿堂里。对于那些不肯遵守全新科罗努斯扩区法典的人，安萨元帅会派遣死士小队，将那些罪人就地格杀。这些毫不留情的突袭，让所有人都感觉到难以喘息的恐怖，代表着科罗努斯扩区残忍、无情的全新律法。

languages.text: Cuando llegó la hora de tomar las riendas del Adeptus Arbites, el Mariscal Anthar comenzó su guardia ejecutando de inmediato a quien no le obedeciera incuestionablemente. Su siguiente paso fue formular una nueva Lex Koronus, escrita con la sangre de los criminales. El tomo bendito se expuso en el lugar ahora conocido como Palacio del Castigo. El Mariscal Anthar enviaba escuadrones de la muerte contra quien no siguiera la versión más reciente de la Lex Koronus. Estos asaltos despiadados personificaban el terror opresivo del nuevo y monstruoso rostro de la ley en la Extensión.
languages.original_text: When his time came to take the reins of the Adeptus Arbites, Marshal Anthar began his watch by immediately executing any who would not obey him without question. His next step was to formulate a new Lex Koronus, written in the blood of criminals. The sacred tome was put on display at what was now called the Palace of Punishment. Marshal Anthar sent death squads after any who did not uphold the latest version of the Lex Koronus. These merciless raids came to epitomise the oppressive terror of the new and monstrous face of the law in the Expanse.

traits.locale_text: Cuando llegó la hora de tomar las riendas del Adeptus Arbites, el Mariscal Anthar comenzó su guardia ejecutando de inmediato a quien no le obedeciera incuestionablemente. Su siguiente paso fue formular una nueva Lex Koronus, escrita con la sangre de los criminales. El tomo bendito se expuso en el lugar ahora conocido como Palacio del Castigo. El Mariscal Anthar enviaba escuadrones de la muerte contra quien no siguiera la versión más reciente de la Lex Koronus. Estos asaltos despiadados personificaban el terror opresivo del nuevo y monstruoso rostro de la ley en la Extensión.

languages.text: 高等裁定局の指揮を執る時が来ると、アンサール将帥は即座に、疑問を挟まず従わない者すべてを処刑することで監視を始めた。次に彼が行ったのは、新たなレックス・コロヌスの制定であり、それは犯罪者の血によって書かれた。この神聖なる書は、処罰宮と呼ばれるようになった場所に展示された。アンサール将帥は、最新のレックス・コロヌスに従わない者すべてに対して死の部隊を差し向けた。これら容赦ない襲撃は、エクスパンスにおける新しく恐ろしい「法の顔」がもたらす圧政の恐怖の象徴となった。
languages.original_text: When his time came to take the reins of the Adeptus Arbites, Marshal Anthar began his watch by immediately executing any who would not obey him without question. His next step was to formulate a new Lex Koronus, written in the blood of criminals. The sacred tome was put on display at what was now called the Palace of Punishment. Marshal Anthar sent death squads after any who did not uphold the latest version of the Lex Koronus. These merciless raids came to epitomise the oppressive terror of the new and monstrous face of the law in the Expanse.

traits.locale_text: 高等裁定局の指揮を執る時が来ると、アンサール将帥は即座に、疑問を挟まず従わない者すべてを処刑することで監視を始めた。次に彼が行ったのは、新たなレックス・コロヌスの制定であり、それは犯罪者の血によって書かれた。この神聖なる書は、処罰宮と呼ばれるようになった場所に展示された。アンサール将帥は、最新のレックス・コロヌスに従わない者すべてに対して死の部隊を差し向けた。これら容赦ない襲撃は、エクスパンスにおける新しく恐ろしい「法の顔」がもたらす圧政の恐怖の象徴となった。

languages.text: Adeptus Arbites'in dizginlerini eline alma zamanı geldiğinde Miralay Anthar, görevine kendisine sorgusuz sualsiz itaat etmeyecek herkesi derhâl infaz ederek başladı. Bir sonraki adımı, suçluların kanıyla yazılmış yeni bir Lex Koronus ortaya koymak oldu. Bu kutsal cilt, artık Ceza Sarayı olarak adlandırılan yerde sergilendi. Miralay Anthar, Lex Koronus'un son hâline uygun hareket etmeyen herkesin peşinden ölüm mangaları gönderdi. Bu acımasız baskınlar, Enginlik'teki kanunun yeni ve canavarca yüzünü ortaya çıkarıp baskıcı korku rejiminin timsali hâline geldi.
languages.original_text: When his time came to take the reins of the Adeptus Arbites, Marshal Anthar began his watch by immediately executing any who would not obey him without question. His next step was to formulate a new Lex Koronus, written in the blood of criminals. The sacred tome was put on display at what was now called the Palace of Punishment. Marshal Anthar sent death squads after any who did not uphold the latest version of the Lex Koronus. These merciless raids came to epitomise the oppressive terror of the new and monstrous face of the law in the Expanse.

traits.locale_text: Adeptus Arbites'in dizginlerini eline alma zamanı geldiğinde Miralay Anthar, görevine kendisine sorgusuz sualsiz itaat etmeyecek herkesi derhâl infaz ederek başladı. Bir sonraki adımı suçluların kanıyla yazılmış yeni bir Lex Koronus ortaya koymak oldu. Bu kutsal cilt, artık Ceza Sarayı olarak adlandırılan yerde sergilendi. Miralay Anthar, Lex Koronus'un son hâline uygun hareket etmeyen herkesin peşinden ölüm mangaları gönderdi. Bu acımasız baskınlar, Enginlik'teki kanunun yeni ve canavarca yüzünü ortaya çıkardı ve baskıcı korku rejiminin timsali hâline geldi.
